snippet: Jim Caruso and his sidekick, Billy Stritch, are true believers in old-fashioned vaudeville-descended entertainment as panacea and escape.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Jim Caruso's Cast Party Goes to the Movies!, vaudeville sing-along hosted by entertainer Jim Caruso, at the Appel Room, as part of Lincoln Center's American Songbook series.
lead_paragraph: Jim Caruso and his sidekick, Billy Stritch, are true believers in old-fashioned vaudeville-descended entertainment as panacea and escape.

headline.seo: ‘Jim Caruso’s Cast Party Goes to the Movies!’ in Songbook Series
headline.main: Forget Your Troubles With Songs of Hollywood
headline.print_headline: Forget Your Troubles With Songs of Hollywood

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
